This company is a scam and worked with a company called smm limited. I tried to withdraw 3500.00 from my wallet and they asked me to pay 1750.00 to show i am legitimate  once I had done that they asked me for a further 4200.00 which buy this stage I made further investigations and I did not pay as I realize its a scam.
